title.narrative: CSR-Facility: Establishment and implementation of international standards for sustainable and traceable cocoa

description.narrative:
The objectives of the project are to obtain: - Greater transparency and verifiability of sustainability in the value chain of the cocoa industry - Strengthening of sustainability as a competitive factor in the cocoa industry - Improved working conditions and livelihood for cocoa farmers - Sustainable management of resources when farming cocoa - Larger production of sustainable cocoa and easier access for farmers to the global market - Improved education and training of cocoa farmers - Better income by cocoa farmers - Improved occupational health and safety of cocoa workers - Less impact on the environment by cocoa farming - Development of standardization competencies and organizational infrastructure in select cocoa-producing countries - Active participation of the most important stakeholders from cocoa-producing countries (including NGOs) in standardization, to ensure their influence on future requirements and guidelines
Through: - Harmonization of pre criteria for sustainable cocoa towards one set of criteria standards which also favour the cocoa producing countries - Timely publication of the standards for sustainability and traceability for cocoa - Active engagement of cocoa producing countries in the development of the standards - Empowerment of organizations in cocoa producing countries in international cooperation. - Information to interested parties in the cocoa producing countries.
